DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study demonstrate efficacy safety ( A ) 2 week high dose ribavirin ( `` loading '' , ≥26 mg/kg/day 14 day follow ≥13 mg/kg/day ) follow concentration target ( ≥ 2.5 mg/L ( 10.25 μmol/L ) 28 day initiation ribavirin therapy ) dose ribavirin vs. ( B ) 4 week ribavirin dose initiation PEG-interferon dosing ( `` priming '' , ≥13 mg/kg/day ) follow concentration target ( ≥ 2.5 mg/L ( 10.25 μmol/L ) 28 day initiation ribavirin therapy ) dose ribavirin combination peginterferon alpha-2a interferon naïve patient chronic hepatitis C ( CHC ) virus genotype 1 infection compare ( C ) standard-of-care dose ribavirin ( ≥13 mg/kg/day without monitor ribavirin concentration ) combination peginterferon alpha-2a .
